issue.title: [Integration] Docker image for integration testing can't be built on windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6109](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6109). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Git for windows checks files out with windows line endings and converts them back before checking them in.

This causes issues in the bash scripts (which are copied from the windows file system into the image) we use to build the "arrow_integration_xenial_base" image when using docker on windows.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6109?focusedCommentId=16906576) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
